eu_initiatives: Programme Oversight involving ESF & EAFRD Funding through the Rural Development LEADER Programme and Social Inclusion Community Activation Programme
organisation_name: Limerick Local Community Development Committee - LAG (Limerick LCDC LAG)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
relevant_communication:
Local Economic and Community Plan 
Local Development Strategy  
Social Inclusion Community Activation Programme (SICAP) 
Healthy Limerick Initiative
legal_status: Statutory sub-committee of Limerick City and County Council
goals__remit: The Limerick Local Community Development Committee (LCDC) is established pursuant to Section 36 (1) of the Local Government Reform Act 2014 for the purpose of developing, co-ordinating and implementing a coherent and integrated approach to local and community development in Limerick City and County.
